description: An opulent palace hotel offering regal suites, lush gardens, and unparalleled service.
A landmark hotel on the Corniche with sweeping Red Sea views and executive lounges.
A classic Riyadh hotel known for its heritage, central location, and fine dining.
Modern business hotel located in the city center, offering Swiss hospitality.
A massive hotel offering thousands of rooms with a private walkway to the Grand Mosque.
Located directly opposite the Prophet's Mosque, offering convenience and comfort.
Set in a 6-hectare oasis, this hotel features lush gardens and lagoon-style pools.
Serviced apartments in the historic Al-Balad district, perfect for families.
A reliable and modern hotel for business travelers, close to the Corniche.
Located in the iconic Kingdom Centre, offering stunning city views and a sky-high spa.
A contemporary interpretation of silk road elegance, with direct Haram views.
Boutique hotel with personalized service and a rooftop pool in the city center.
The premier luxury hotel in the Gassim region, ideal for business and events.
A 5-star hotel with two restaurants, just steps from the Prophet's Mosque.
Elegant hotel with spacious rooms and a health club, close to Al Rashid Mall.
Bespoke luxury on the waterfront, featuring the signature St. Regis Butler Service.
Comfortable hotel in the sister city of Abha, known for its cool climate and military base.
Part of the Jabal Omar complex, offering direct access and clear views of the Holy Mosque.
A modern, stylish hotel in the Olaya district, perfect for urban explorers.
A beautiful beachfront resort hotel perfect for diving and relaxation.
A serene, ultra-luxury tented camp set within a secluded desert canyon.
A vast complex with multiple dining options, connected to the Granada Mall.
All-suite hotel with kitchens, designed for extended stays in the port city.
A well-located hotel offering partial Haram views and a comfortable stay for pilgrims.
Contemporary hotel with a focus on value and comfort for visitors to Tabuk.
